title: Isaacman opens door to alternatives to moving shuttle Discovery to Houston
description:
NASA Administrator Jared Isaacman suggested he would be open to transferring a spacecraft other than the space shuttle Discovery to Houston.

The post Isaacman opens door to alternatives to moving shuttle Discovery to Houston appeared first on SpaceNews.
